# Throwing (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
This ability can only be placed on a melee weapon. A melee weapon crafted with this ability gains a range increment of 10 feet and can be thrown by a wielder proficient in its normal use.

Faint transmutation; CL 5th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Magic Stone (Spell)|magic stone]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 472
